2082  /*--- Pitching origin, frequency, and amplitude from config. ---*/
2083  Center[0] = config->GetMotion_Origin_X(iZone);
2084  Center[1] = config->GetMotion_Origin_Y(iZone);
2085  Center[2] = config->GetMotion_Origin_Z(iZone);
2086  Omega[0] = (config->GetPitching_Omega_X(iZone)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
2087  Omega[1] = (config->GetPitching_Omega_Y(iZone)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
2088  Omega[2] = (config->GetPitching_Omega_Z(iZone)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
2089  Ampl[0] = config->GetPitching_Ampl_X(iZone)*DEG2RAD;
2090  Ampl[1] = config->GetPitching_Ampl_Y(iZone)*DEG2RAD;
2091  Ampl[2] = config->GetPitching_Ampl_Z(iZone)*DEG2RAD;
2092  Phase[0] = config->GetPitching_Phase_X(iZone)*DEG2RAD;
2093  Phase[1] = config->GetPitching_Phase_Y(iZone)*DEG2RAD;
2094  Phase[2] = config->GetPitching_Phase_Z(iZone)*DEG2RAD;
2095 
2096  if (harmonic_balance) {
2097  /*--- period of oscillation & compute time interval using nTimeInstances ---*/
2098  su2double period = config->GetHarmonicBalance_Period();
2099  period /= config->GetTime_Ref();
2100  deltaT = period/(su2double)(config->GetnTimeInstances());
2101  }
2102 
2103  /*--- Compute delta time based on physical time step ---*/
2104  if (adjoint) {
2105  /*--- For the unsteady adjoint, we integrate backwards through
2106  physical time, so perform mesh motion in reverse. ---*/
2107  unsigned long nFlowIter = config->GetnExtIter();
2108  unsigned long directIter = nFlowIter - iter - 1;
2109  time_new = static_cast<su2double>(directIter)*deltaT;
2110  time_old = time_new;
2111  if (iter != 0) time_old = (static_cast<su2double>(directIter)+1.0)*deltaT;
2112  } else {
2113  /*--- Forward time for the direct problem ---*/
2114  time_new = static_cast<su2double>(iter)*deltaT;
2115  if (harmonic_balance) {
2116  /*--- For harmonic balance, begin movement from the zero position ---*/
2117  time_old = 0.0;
2118  } else {
2119  time_old = time_new;
2120  if (iter != 0) time_old = (static_cast<su2double>(iter)-1.0)*deltaT;
2121  }
2122  }
2123 
2124  /*--- Compute delta change in the angle about the x, y, & z axes. ---*/
2125 
2126  dtheta = -Ampl[0]*(sin(Omega[0]*time_new + Phase[0]) - sin(Omega[0]*time_old + Phase[0]));
2127  dphi = -Ampl[1]*(sin(Omega[1]*time_new + Phase[1]) - sin(Omega[1]*time_old + Phase[1]));
2128  dpsi = -Ampl[2]*(sin(Omega[2]*time_new + Phase[2]) - sin(Omega[2]*time_old + Phase[2]));
2129 
2130  /*--- Angular velocity at the new time ---*/
2131 
2132  alphaDot[0] = -Omega[0]*Ampl[0]*cos(Omega[0]*time_new);
2133  alphaDot[1] = -Omega[1]*Ampl[1]*cos(Omega[1]*time_new);
2134  alphaDot[2] = -Omega[2]*Ampl[2]*cos(Omega[2]*time_new);
2135 
2136  if (rank == MASTER_NODE && iter == 0) {
2137  cout << " Pitching frequency: (" << Omega[0] << ", " << Omega[1];
2138  cout << ", " << Omega[2] << ") rad/s." << endl;
2139  cout << " Pitching amplitude: (" << Ampl[0]/DEG2RAD << ", ";
2140  cout << Ampl[1]/DEG2RAD << ", " << Ampl[2]/DEG2RAD;
2141  cout << ") degrees."<< endl;
2142  cout << " Pitching phase lag: (" << Phase[0]/DEG2RAD << ", ";
2143  cout << Phase[1]/DEG2RAD <<", "<< Phase[2]/DEG2RAD;
2144  cout << ") degrees."<< endl;
2145  }
2146 
2147  /*--- Store angles separately for clarity. Compute sines/cosines. ---*/
2148 
2149  cosTheta = cos(dtheta); cosPhi = cos(dphi); cosPsi = cos(dpsi);
2150  sinTheta = sin(dtheta); sinPhi = sin(dphi); sinPsi = sin(dpsi);
2151 
2152  /*--- Compute the rotation matrix. Note that the implicit
2153  ordering is rotation about the x-axis, y-axis, then z-axis. ---*/
2154 
2155  rotMatrix[0][0] = cosPhi*cosPsi;
2156  rotMatrix[1][0] = cosPhi*sinPsi;
2157  rotMatrix[2][0] = -sinPhi;
2158 
2159  rotMatrix[0][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi - cosTheta*sinPsi;
2160  rotMatrix[1][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi + cosTheta*cosPsi;
2161  rotMatrix[2][1] = sinTheta*cosPhi;
2162 
2163  rotMatrix[0][2] = cosTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi + sinTheta*sinPsi;
2164  rotMatrix[1][2] = cosTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi - sinTheta*cosPsi;
2165  rotMatrix[2][2] = cosTheta*cosPhi;
2166 
2167  /*--- Loop over and rotate each node in the volume mesh ---*/
2168  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
2169 
2170  /*--- Coordinates of the current point ---*/
2171  Coord = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2172  GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
2173 
2174  /*--- Calculate non-dim. position from rotation center ---*/
2175  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2176  r[iDim] = (Coord[iDim]-Center[iDim])/Lref;
2177  if (nDim == 2) r[nDim] = 0.0;
2178 
2179  /*--- Compute transformed point coordinates ---*/
2180  rotCoord[0] = rotMatrix[0][0]*r[0]
2181  + rotMatrix[0][1]*r[1]
2182  + rotMatrix[0][2]*r[2];
2183 
2184  rotCoord[1] = rotMatrix[1][0]*r[0]
2185  + rotMatrix[1][1]*r[1]
2186  + rotMatrix[1][2]*r[2];
2187 
2188  rotCoord[2] = rotMatrix[2][0]*r[0]
2189  + rotMatrix[2][1]*r[1]
2190  + rotMatrix[2][2]*r[2];
2191 
2192  /*--- Cross Product of angular velocity and distance from center.
2193  Note that we have assumed the grid velocities have been set to
2194  an initial value in the plunging routine. ---*/
2195 
2196  newGridVel[0] = GridVel[0] + alphaDot[1]*rotCoord[2] - alphaDot[2]*rotCoord[1];
2197  newGridVel[1] = GridVel[1] + alphaDot[2]*rotCoord[0] - alphaDot[0]*rotCoord[2];
2198  newGridVel[2] = GridVel[2] + alphaDot[0]*rotCoord[1] - alphaDot[1]*rotCoord[0];
2199 
2200  /*--- Store new node location & grid velocity. Add center location.
2201  Do not store the grid velocity if this is an adjoint calculation.---*/
2202 
2203  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2204  geometry->node[iPoint]->SetCoord(iDim, rotCoord[iDim]+Center[iDim]);
2205  if (!adjoint) geometry->node[iPoint]->SetGridVel(iDim, newGridVel[iDim]);
2206  }
2207  }
2208 
2209  /*--- For pitching we don't update the motion origin and moment reference origin. ---*/
2210 
2211  /*--- After moving all nodes, update geometry class ---*/
2212 
2213  UpdateDualGrid(geometry, config);
2214 
2215 }
2216 
2217 void CVolumetricMovement::Rigid_Plunging(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned short iZone, unsigned long iter) {
2218 
2219  /*--- Local variables ---*/
2220  su2double deltaX[3], newCoord[3], Center[3], *Coord, Omega[3], Ampl[3], Lref;
2221  su2double *GridVel, newGridVel[3], xDot[3];
2222  su2double deltaT, time_new, time_old;
2223  unsigned short iDim, nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
2224  unsigned long iPoint;
2225  bool harmonic_balance = (config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == HARMONIC_BALANCE);
2226  bool adjoint = config->GetContinuous_Adjoint();
2227 
2228 
2229  /*--- Retrieve values from the config file ---*/
2230  deltaT = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
2231  Lref = config->GetLength_Ref();
2232 
2233  /*--- For harmonic balance, motion is the same in each zone (at each instance). ---*/
2234  if (harmonic_balance) {
2235  iZone = ZONE_0;
2236  }
2237 
2238  /*--- Plunging frequency and amplitude from config. ---*/
2239  Center[0] = config->GetMotion_Origin_X(iZone);
2240  Center[1] = config->GetMotion_Origin_Y(iZone);
2241  Center[2] = config->GetMotion_Origin_Z(iZone);
2242  Omega[0] = (config->GetPlunging_Omega_X(iZone)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
2243  Omega[1] = (config->GetPlunging_Omega_Y(iZone)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
2244  Omega[2] = (config->GetPlunging_Omega_Z(iZone)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
2245  Ampl[0] = config->GetPlunging_Ampl_X(iZone)/Lref;
2246  Ampl[1] = config->GetPlunging_Ampl_Y(iZone)/Lref;
2247  Ampl[2] = config->GetPlunging_Ampl_Z(iZone)/Lref;
2248 
2249  if (harmonic_balance) {
2250  /*--- period of oscillation & time interval using nTimeInstances ---*/
2251  su2double period = config->GetHarmonicBalance_Period();
2252  period /= config->GetTime_Ref();
2253  deltaT = period/(su2double)(config->GetnTimeInstances());
2254  }
2255 
2256  /*--- Compute delta time based on physical time step ---*/
2257  if (adjoint) {
2258  /*--- For the unsteady adjoint, we integrate backwards through
2259  physical time, so perform mesh motion in reverse. ---*/
2260  unsigned long nFlowIter = config->GetnExtIter();
2261  unsigned long directIter = nFlowIter - iter - 1;
2262  time_new = static_cast<su2double>(directIter)*deltaT;
2263  time_old = time_new;
2264  if (iter != 0) time_old = (static_cast<su2double>(directIter)+1.0)*deltaT;
2265  } else {
2266  /*--- Forward time for the direct problem ---*/
2267  time_new = static_cast<su2double>(iter)*deltaT;
2268  if (harmonic_balance) {
2269  /*--- For harmonic balance, begin movement from the zero position ---*/
2270  time_old = 0.0;
2271  } else {
2272  time_old = time_new;
2273  if (iter != 0) time_old = (static_cast<su2double>(iter)-1.0)*deltaT;
2274  }
2275  }
2276 
2277  /*--- Compute delta change in the position in the x, y, & z directions. ---*/
2278  deltaX[0] = -Ampl[0]*(sin(Omega[0]*time_new) - sin(Omega[0]*time_old));
2279  deltaX[1] = -Ampl[1]*(sin(Omega[1]*time_new) - sin(Omega[1]*time_old));
2280  deltaX[2] = -Ampl[2]*(sin(Omega[2]*time_new) - sin(Omega[2]*time_old));
2281 
2282  /*--- Compute grid velocity due to plunge in the x, y, & z directions. ---*/
2283  xDot[0] = -Ampl[0]*Omega[0]*(cos(Omega[0]*time_new));
2284  xDot[1] = -Ampl[1]*Omega[1]*(cos(Omega[1]*time_new));
2285  xDot[2] = -Ampl[2]*Omega[2]*(cos(Omega[2]*time_new));
2286 
2287  if (rank == MASTER_NODE && iter == 0) {
2288  cout << " Plunging frequency: (" << Omega[0] << ", " << Omega[1];
2289  cout << ", " << Omega[2] << ") rad/s." << endl;
2290  cout << " Plunging amplitude: (" << Ampl[0] << ", ";
2291  cout << Ampl[1] << ", " << Ampl[2] << ") m."<< endl;
2292  }
2293 
2294  /*--- Loop over and move each node in the volume mesh ---*/
2295  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
2296 
2297  /*--- Coordinates of the current point ---*/
2298  Coord = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2299  GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
2300 
2301  /*--- Increment the node position using the delta values. ---*/
2302  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2303  newCoord[iDim] = Coord[iDim] + deltaX[iDim];
2304 
2305  /*--- Cross Product of angular velocity and distance from center.
2306  Note that we have assumed the grid velocities have been set to
2307  an initial value in the plunging routine. ---*/
2308 
2309  newGridVel[0] = GridVel[0] + xDot[0];
2310  newGridVel[1] = GridVel[1] + xDot[1];
2311  newGridVel[2] = GridVel[2] + xDot[2];
2312 
2313  /*--- Store new node location & grid velocity. Do not store the grid
2314  velocity if this is an adjoint calculation. ---*/
2315 
2316  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2317  geometry->node[iPoint]->SetCoord(iDim, newCoord[iDim]);
2318  if (!adjoint) geometry->node[iPoint]->SetGridVel(iDim, newGridVel[iDim]);
2319  }
2320  }
2321 
2322  /*--- Set the mesh motion center to the new location after
2323  incrementing the position with the rigid translation. This
2324  new location will be used for subsequent pitching/rotation.---*/
2325 
2326  config->SetMotion_Origin_X(iZone, Center[0]+deltaX[0]);
2327  config->SetMotion_Origin_Y(iZone, Center[1]+deltaX[1]);
2328  config->SetMotion_Origin_Z(iZone, Center[2]+deltaX[2]);
2329 
2330  /*--- As the body origin may have moved, print it to the console ---*/
2331 
2332 // if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
2333 // cout << " Body origin: (" << Center[0]+deltaX[0];
2334 // cout << ", " << Center[1]+deltaX[1] << ", " << Center[2]+deltaX[2];
2335 // cout << ")." << endl;
2336 // }
2337 
2338  /*--- Set the moment computation center to the new location after
2339  incrementing the position with the plunging. ---*/
2340 
2341  for (unsigned short jMarker=0; jMarker<config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); jMarker++) {
2342  Center[0] = config->GetRefOriginMoment_X(jMarker) + deltaX[0];
2343  Center[1] = config->GetRefOriginMoment_Y(jMarker) + deltaX[1];
2344  Center[2] = config->GetRefOriginMoment_Z(jMarker) + deltaX[2];
2345  config->SetRefOriginMoment_X(jMarker, Center[0]);
2346  config->SetRefOriginMoment_Y(jMarker, Center[1]);
2347  config->SetRefOriginMoment_Z(jMarker, Center[2]);
2348  }
2349 
2350  /*--- After moving all nodes, update geometry class ---*/
2351 
2352  UpdateDualGrid(geometry, config);
2353 
2354 }
2355 
2356 void CVolumetricMovement::Rigid_Translation(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned short iZone, unsigned long iter) {
2357 
2358  /*--- Local variables ---*/
2359  su2double deltaX[3], newCoord[3], Center[3], *Coord;
2360  su2double xDot[3];
2361  su2double deltaT, time_new, time_old;
2362  unsigned short iDim, nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
2363  unsigned long iPoint;
2364  bool harmonic_balance = (config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == HARMONIC_BALANCE);
2365  bool adjoint = config->GetContinuous_Adjoint();
2366 
2367 
2368  /*--- Retrieve values from the config file ---*/
2369  deltaT = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
2370 
2371  /*--- For harmonic balance, motion is the same in each zone (at each instance). ---*/
2372  if (harmonic_balance) {
2373  iZone = ZONE_0;
2374  }
2375 
2376  /*--- Get motion center and translation rates from config ---*/
2377  Center[0] = config->GetMotion_Origin_X(iZone);
2378  Center[1] = config->GetMotion_Origin_Y(iZone);
2379  Center[2] = config->GetMotion_Origin_Z(iZone);
2380  xDot[0] = config->GetTranslation_Rate_X(iZone);
2381  xDot[1] = config->GetTranslation_Rate_Y(iZone);
2382  xDot[2] = config->GetTranslation_Rate_Z(iZone);
2383 
2384  if (harmonic_balance) {
2385  /*--- period of oscillation & time interval using nTimeInstances ---*/
2386  su2double period = config->GetHarmonicBalance_Period();
2387  period /= config->GetTime_Ref();
2388  deltaT = period/(su2double)(config->GetnTimeInstances());
2389  }
2390 
2391  /*--- Compute delta time based on physical time step ---*/
2392  if (adjoint) {
2393  /*--- For the unsteady adjoint, we integrate backwards through
2394  physical time, so perform mesh motion in reverse. ---*/
2395  unsigned long nFlowIter = config->GetnExtIter();
2396  unsigned long directIter = nFlowIter - iter - 1;
2397  time_new = static_cast<su2double>(directIter)*deltaT;
2398  time_old = time_new;
2399  if (iter != 0) time_old = (static_cast<su2double>(directIter)+1.0)*deltaT;
2400  } else {
2401  /*--- Forward time for the direct problem ---*/
2402  time_new = static_cast<su2double>(iter)*deltaT;
2403  if (harmonic_balance) {
2404  /*--- For harmonic balance, begin movement from the zero position ---*/
2405  time_old = 0.0;
2406  } else {
2407  time_old = time_new;
2408  if (iter != 0) time_old = (static_cast<su2double>(iter)-1.0)*deltaT;
2409  }
2410  }
2411 
2412  /*--- Compute delta change in the position in the x, y, & z directions. ---*/
2413  deltaX[0] = xDot[0]*(time_new-time_old);
2414  deltaX[1] = xDot[1]*(time_new-time_old);
2415  deltaX[2] = xDot[2]*(time_new-time_old);
2416 
2417  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
2418  cout << " New physical time: " << time_new << " seconds." << endl;
2419  if (iter == 0) {
2420  cout << " Translational velocity: (" << xDot[0]*config->GetVelocity_Ref() << ", " << xDot[1]*config->GetVelocity_Ref();
2421  cout << ", " << xDot[2]*config->GetVelocity_Ref();
2422  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout << ") m/s." << endl;
2423  else cout << ") ft/s." << endl;
2424  }
2425  }
2426 
2427  /*--- Loop over and move each node in the volume mesh ---*/
2428  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
2429 
2430  /*--- Coordinates of the current point ---*/
2431  Coord = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2432 
2433  /*--- Increment the node position using the delta values. ---*/
2434  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2435  newCoord[iDim] = Coord[iDim] + deltaX[iDim];
2436 
2437  /*--- Store new node location & grid velocity. Do not store the grid
2438  velocity if this is an adjoint calculation. ---*/
2439 
2440  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2441  geometry->node[iPoint]->SetCoord(iDim, newCoord[iDim]);
2442  if (!adjoint) geometry->node[iPoint]->SetGridVel(iDim,xDot[iDim]);
2443  }
2444  }
2445 
2446  /*--- Set the mesh motion center to the new location after
2447  incrementing the position with the rigid translation. This
2448  new location will be used for subsequent pitching/rotation.---*/
2449 
2450  config->SetMotion_Origin_X(iZone, Center[0]+deltaX[0]);
2451  config->SetMotion_Origin_Y(iZone, Center[1]+deltaX[1]);
2452  config->SetMotion_Origin_Z(iZone, Center[2]+deltaX[2]);
2453 
2454  /*--- Set the moment computation center to the new location after
2455  incrementing the position with the translation. ---*/
2456 
2457  for (unsigned short jMarker=0; jMarker<config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); jMarker++) {
2458  Center[0] = config->GetRefOriginMoment_X(jMarker) + deltaX[0];
2459  Center[1] = config->GetRefOriginMoment_Y(jMarker) + deltaX[1];
2460  Center[2] = config->GetRefOriginMoment_Z(jMarker) + deltaX[2];
2461  config->SetRefOriginMoment_X(jMarker, Center[0]);
2462  config->SetRefOriginMoment_Y(jMarker, Center[1]);
2463  config->SetRefOriginMoment_Z(jMarker, Center[2]);
2464  }
2465 
2466  /*--- After moving all nodes, update geometry class ---*/
2467 
2468  UpdateDualGrid(geometry, config);
2469 
2470 }
2471 
2472 void CVolumetricMovement::SetVolume_Scaling(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, bool UpdateGeo) {
2473 
2474  unsigned short iDim;
2475  unsigned long iPoint;
2476  su2double newCoord[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, *Coord;
2477 
2478  /*--- The scaling factor is the only input to this option. Currently,
2479  the mesh must be scaled the same amount in all three directions. ---*/
2480 
2481  su2double Scale = config->GetDV_Value(0)*config->GetOpt_RelaxFactor();
2482 
2483  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
2484  cout << "Scaling the mesh by a constant factor of " << Scale << "." << endl;
2485  }
2486 
2487  /*--- Loop over and move each node in the volume mesh ---*/
2488  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
2489 
2490  /*--- Coordinates of the current point ---*/
2491  Coord = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2492 
2493  /*--- Scale the node position by the specified factor. ---*/
2494  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2495  newCoord[iDim] = Scale*Coord[iDim];
2496 
2497  /*--- Store the new node location. ---*/
2498  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2499  geometry->node[iPoint]->SetCoord(iDim, newCoord[iDim]);
2500  }
2501  }
2502 
2503  /*--- After moving all nodes, update geometry class ---*/
2504  if (UpdateGeo) UpdateDualGrid(geometry, config);
2505 
2506 }
2507 
2508 void CVolumetricMovement::SetVolume_Translation(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, bool UpdateGeo) {
2509 
2510  unsigned short iDim;
2511  unsigned long iPoint;
2512  su2double *Coord, deltaX[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, newCoord[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0};
2513  su2double Scale = config->GetOpt_RelaxFactor();
2514 
2515  /*--- Get the unit vector and magnitude of displacement. Note that we
2516  assume this is the first DV entry since it is for mesh translation.
2517  Create the displacement vector from the magnitude and direction. ---*/
2518 
2519  su2double Ampl = config->GetDV_Value(0)*Scale;
2520  su2double length = 0.0;
2521  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2522  deltaX[iDim] = config->GetParamDV(0, iDim);
2523  length += deltaX[iDim]*deltaX[iDim];
2524  }
2525  length = sqrt(length);
2526  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2527  deltaX[iDim] = Ampl*deltaX[iDim]/length;
2528  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
2529  cout << "Translational displacement: (" << deltaX[0] << ", ";
2530  cout << deltaX[1] << ", " << deltaX[2] << ")." << endl;
2531  }
2532 
2533  /*--- Loop over and move each node in the volume mesh ---*/
2534  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
2535 
2536  /*--- Coordinates of the current point ---*/
2537  Coord = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2538 
2539  /*--- Increment the node position using the delta values. ---*/
2540  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2541  newCoord[iDim] = Coord[iDim] + deltaX[iDim];
2542 
2543  /*--- Store new node location. ---*/
2544  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2545  geometry->node[iPoint]->SetCoord(iDim, newCoord[iDim]);
2546  }
2547  }
2548 
2549  /*--- After moving all nodes, update geometry class ---*/
2550  if (UpdateGeo) UpdateDualGrid(geometry, config);
2551 
2552 }
2553 
2554 void CVolumetricMovement::SetVolume_Rotation(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, bool UpdateGeo) {
2555 
2556  unsigned short iDim;
2557  unsigned long iPoint;
2558  su2double x, y, z;
2559  su2double *Coord, deltaX[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, newCoord[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0};
2560  su2double Scale = config->GetOpt_RelaxFactor();
2561 
2562  /*--- xyz-coordinates of a point on the line of rotation. */
2563  su2double a = config->GetParamDV(0, 0);
2564  su2double b = config->GetParamDV(0, 1);
2565  su2double c = 0.0;
2566  if (geometry->GetnDim() == 3) c = config->GetParamDV(0,2);
2567 
2568  /*--- xyz-coordinate of the line's direction vector. ---*/
2569  su2double u = config->GetParamDV(0, 3)-config->GetParamDV(0, 0);
2570  su2double v = config->GetParamDV(0, 4)-config->GetParamDV(0, 1);
2571  su2double w = 1.0;
2572  if (geometry->GetnDim() == 3)
2573  w = config->GetParamDV(0, 5)-config->GetParamDV(0, 2);
2574 
2575  /*--- The angle of rotation. ---*/
2576  su2double theta = config->GetDV_Value(0)*Scale*PI_NUMBER/180.0;
2577 
2578  /*--- Print to the console. ---*/
2579  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
2580  cout << "Rotation axis vector: (" << u << ", ";
2581  cout << v << ", " << w << ")." << endl;
2582  cout << "Angle of rotation: " << config->GetDV_Value(0)*Scale;
2583  cout << " degrees." << endl;
2584  }
2585 
2586  /*--- Intermediate values used in computations. ---*/
2587  su2double u2=u*u; su2double v2=v*v; su2double w2=w*w;
2588  su2double cosT = cos(theta); su2double sinT = sin(theta);
2589  su2double l2 = u2 + v2 + w2; su2double l = sqrt(l2);
2590 
2591  /*--- Loop over and move each node in the volume mesh ---*/
2592  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
2593 
2594  /*--- Coordinates of the current point ---*/
2595  Coord = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2596 
2597  /*--- Displacement for this point due to the rotation. ---*/
2598  x = Coord[0]; y = Coord[1]; z = 0.0;
2599  if (geometry->GetnDim() == 3) z = Coord[2];
2600 
2601  deltaX[0] = a*(v2 + w2) + u*(-b*v - c*w + u*x + v*y + w*z)
2602  + (-a*(v2 + w2) + u*(b*v + c*w - v*y - w*z) + (v2 + w2)*x)*cosT
2603  + l*(-c*v + b*w - w*y + v*z)*sinT;
2604  deltaX[0] = deltaX[0]/l2 - x;
2605 
2606  deltaX[1] = b*(u2 + w2) + v*(-a*u - c*w + u*x + v*y + w*z)
2607  + (-b*(u2 + w2) + v*(a*u + c*w - u*x - w*z) + (u2 + w2)*y)*cosT
2608  + l*(c*u - a*w + w*x - u*z)*sinT;
2609  deltaX[1] = deltaX[1]/l2 - y;
2610 
2611  deltaX[2] = c*(u2 + v2) + w*(-a*u - b*v + u*x + v*y + w*z)
2612  + (-c*(u2 + v2) + w*(a*u + b*v - u*x - v*y) + (u2 + v2)*z)*cosT
2613  + l*(-b*u + a*v - v*x + u*y)*sinT;
2614  if (geometry->GetnDim() == 3) deltaX[2] = deltaX[2]/l2 - z;
2615  else deltaX[2] = 0.0;
2616 
2617  /*--- Increment the node position using the delta values. ---*/
2618  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2619  newCoord[iDim] = Coord[iDim] + deltaX[iDim];
2620 
2621  /*--- Store new node location. ---*/
2622  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2623  geometry->node[iPoint]->SetCoord(iDim, newCoord[iDim]);
2624  }
2625  }
2626 
2627  /*--- After moving all nodes, update geometry class ---*/
2628  if (UpdateGeo) UpdateDualGrid(geometry, config);
2629 
2630 }
2631 
2632 CSurfaceMovement::CSurfaceMovement(void) : CGridMovement() {
2633 
2634  size = SU2_MPI::GetSize();
2635  rank = SU2_MPI::GetRank();
2636 
2637  nFFDBox = 0;
2638  nLevel = 0;
2639  FFDBoxDefinition = false;
2640 }
2641 
2642 CSurfaceMovement::~CSurfaceMovement(void) {}
2643 
2644 void CSurfaceMovement::SetSurface_Deformation(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
2645 
2646  unsigned short iFFDBox, iDV, iLevel, iChild, iParent, jFFDBox, iMarker;
2647  unsigned short Degree_Unitary [] = {1,1,1}, BSpline_Unitary [] = {2,2,2};
2648  su2double MaxDiff, Current_Scale, Ratio, New_Scale;
2649  string FFDBoxTag;
2650  bool allmoving;
2651 
2652  bool cylindrical = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == CYLINDRICAL);
2653  bool spherical = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == SPHERICAL);
2654  bool polar = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == POLAR);
2655  bool cartesian = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == CARTESIAN);
2656  su2double BoundLimit = config->GetOpt_LineSearch_Bound();
2657 
2658  /*--- Setting the Free Form Deformation ---*/
2659 
2660  if (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_SETTING) {
2661 
2662  /*--- Definition of the FFD deformation class ---*/
2663 
2664  FFDBox = new CFreeFormDefBox*[MAX_NUMBER_FFD];
2665 
2666  /*--- Read the FFD information from the config file ---*/
2667 
2668  ReadFFDInfo(geometry, config, FFDBox);
2669 
2670  /*--- If there is a FFDBox in the input file ---*/
2671 
2672  if (nFFDBox != 0) {
2673 
2674  /*--- if polar coordinates, trnasform the corner to polar ---*/
2675 
2676  if (cylindrical) {
2677  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2678  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCart2Cyl_CornerPoints(config);
2679  }
2680  }
2681  else if (spherical || polar) {
2682  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2683  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCart2Sphe_CornerPoints(config);
2684  }
2685  }
2686 
2687  /*--- If the FFDBox was not defined in the input file ---*/
2688 
2689  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (GetnFFDBox() != 0)) {
2690  if (cartesian) cout << endl <<"----------------- FFD technique (cartesian -> parametric) ---------------" << endl;
2691  else if (cylindrical) cout << endl <<"----------------- FFD technique (cylinder -> parametric) ---------------" << endl;
2692  else if (spherical) cout << endl <<"----------------- FFD technique (spherical -> parametric) ---------------" << endl;
2693  else if (polar) cout << endl <<"----------------- FFD technique (polar -> parametric) ---------------" << endl;
2694  }
2695 
2696  /*--- Create a unitary FFDBox as baseline for other FFDBoxes shapes ---*/
2697 
2698  CFreeFormDefBox FFDBox_unitary(Degree_Unitary, BSpline_Unitary, BEZIER);
2699  FFDBox_unitary.SetUnitCornerPoints();
2700 
2701  /*--- Compute the control points of the unitary box, in this case the degree is 1 and the order is 2 ---*/
2702 
2703  FFDBox_unitary.SetControlPoints_Parallelepiped();
2704 
2705  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2706 
2707  /*--- Compute the support control points for the final FFD using the unitary box ---*/
2708 
2709  FFDBox_unitary.SetSupportCP(FFDBox[iFFDBox]);
2710 
2711  /*--- Compute control points in the support box ---*/
2712 
2713  FFDBox_unitary.SetSupportCPChange(FFDBox[iFFDBox]);
2714 
2715  /*--- Compute the parametric coordinates, it also find the points in
2716  the FFDBox using the parametrics coordinates ---*/
2717 
2718  SetParametricCoord(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], iFFDBox);
2719 
2720 
2721  /*--- If polar coordinates, transform the corners and control points to cartesians ---*/
2722 
2723  if (cylindrical) {
2724  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCyl2Cart_CornerPoints(config);
2725  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCyl2Cart_ControlPoints(config);
2726  }
2727  else if (spherical || polar) {
2728  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetSphe2Cart_CornerPoints(config);
2729  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetSphe2Cart_ControlPoints(config);
2730  }
2731 
2732  /*--- Output original FFD FFDBox ---*/
2733 
2734  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
2735  if ((config->GetOutput_FileFormat() == PARAVIEW) || (config->GetOutput_FileFormat() == PARAVIEW_BINARY)) {
2736  cout << "Writing a Paraview file of the FFD boxes." << endl;
2737  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetParaview(geometry, iFFDBox, true);
2738  }
2739  else {
2740  cout << "Writing a Tecplot file of the FFD boxes." << endl;
2741  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetTecplot(geometry, iFFDBox, true);
2742  }
2743  }
2744 
2745  }
2746 
2747  }
2748 
2749  else {
2750  SU2_MPI::Error("There are not FFD boxes in the mesh file!!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2751  }
2752 
2753  }
2754 
2755  /*--- Free Form deformation based ---*/
2756 
2757  if ((config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_CONTROL_POINT_2D) ||
2758  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_CAMBER_2D) ||
2759  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_THICKNESS_2D) ||
2760  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_TWIST_2D) ||
2761  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_CONTROL_POINT) ||
2762  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_NACELLE) ||
2763  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_GULL) ||
2764  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_TWIST) ||
2765  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_ROTATION) ||
2766  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_CONTROL_SURFACE) ||
2767  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_CAMBER) ||
2768  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_THICKNESS) ||
2769  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK)) {
2770 
2771  /*--- Definition of the FFD deformation class ---*/
2772 
2773  FFDBox = new CFreeFormDefBox*[MAX_NUMBER_FFD];
2774 
2775  /*--- Read the FFD information from the grid file ---*/
2776 
2777  ReadFFDInfo(geometry, config, FFDBox, config->GetMesh_FileName());
2778 
2779  /*--- If there is a FFDBox in the input file ---*/
2780 
2781  if (nFFDBox != 0) {
2782 
2783  /*--- If the FFDBox was not defined in the input file ---*/
2784 
2785  if (!GetFFDBoxDefinition()) {
2786  SU2_MPI::Error(string("There is not FFD box definition in the mesh file,\n") +
2787  string("run DV_KIND=FFD_SETTING first !!"), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2788  }
2789 
2790  /* --- Check if the FFD boxes referenced in the design variable definition can be found --- */
2791 
2792  for (iDV = 0; iDV < config->GetnDV(); iDV++) {
2793  if (!CheckFFDBoxDefinition(config, iDV)) {
2794  SU2_MPI::Error(string("There is no FFD box with tag \"") + config->GetFFDTag(iDV) + string("\" defined in the mesh file.\n") +
2795  string("Check the definition of the design variables and/or the FFD settings !!"), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2796  }
2797  }
2798 
2799  /*--- Check that the user has specified a non-zero number of surfaces to move with DV_MARKER. ---*/
2800 
2801  if (config->GetnMarker_DV() == 0) {
2802  SU2_MPI::Error(string("No markers are specified in DV_MARKER, so no deformation will occur.\n") +
2803  string("List markers to be deformed in DV_MARKER."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2804  }
2805 
2806  /*--- Output original FFD FFDBox ---*/
2807 
2808  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (config->GetKind_SU2() != SU2_DOT)) {
2809  if ((config->GetOutput_FileFormat() == PARAVIEW) || (config->GetOutput_FileFormat() == PARAVIEW_BINARY)) {
2810  cout << "Writing a Paraview file of the FFD boxes." << endl;
2811  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2812  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetParaview(geometry, iFFDBox, true);
2813  }
2814  }
2815  else {
2816  cout << "Writing a Tecplot file of the FFD boxes." << endl;
2817  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2818  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetTecplot(geometry, iFFDBox, true);
2819  }
2820  }
2821  }
2822 
2823  /*--- If polar FFD, change the coordinates system ---*/
2824 
2825  if (cylindrical) {
2826  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2827  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCart2Cyl_CornerPoints(config);
2828  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCart2Cyl_ControlPoints(config);
2829  }
2830  }
2831  else if (spherical || polar) {
2832  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2833  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCart2Sphe_CornerPoints(config);
2834  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCart2Sphe_ControlPoints(config);
2835  }
2836  }
2837 
2838  /*--- Apply the deformation to the orifinal FFD box ---*/
2839 
2840  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (GetnFFDBox() != 0))
2841  cout << endl <<"----------------- FFD technique (parametric -> cartesian) ---------------" << endl;
2842 
2843  /*--- Loop over all the FFD boxes levels ---*/
2844 
2845  for (iLevel = 0; iLevel < GetnLevel(); iLevel++) {
2846 
2847  /*--- Loop over all FFD FFDBoxes ---*/
2848 
2849  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2850 
2851  /*--- Check the level of the FFD box ---*/
2852 
2853  if (FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetLevel() == iLevel) {
2854 
2855  /*--- Check the dimension of the FFD compared with the design variables ---*/
2856 
2857  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Checking FFD box dimension." << endl;
2858  CheckFFDDimension(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], iFFDBox);
2859 
2860  /*--- Compute intersections of the FFD box with the surface to eliminate design
2861  variables and satisfy surface continuity ---*/
2862 
2863  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Checking FFD box intersections with the solid surfaces." << endl;
2864  CheckFFDIntersections(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], iFFDBox);
2865 
2866  /*--- Compute the parametric coordinates of the child box
2867  control points (using the parent FFDBox) ---*/
2868 
2869  for (iChild = 0; iChild < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnChildFFDBox(); iChild++) {
2870  FFDBoxTag = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetChildFFDBoxTag(iChild);
2871  for (jFFDBox = 0; jFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); jFFDBox++)
2872  if (FFDBoxTag == FFDBox[jFFDBox]->GetTag()) break;
2873  SetParametricCoordCP(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox[jFFDBox]);
2874  }
2875 
2876  /*--- Update the parametric coordinates if it is a child FFDBox ---*/
2877 
2878  if (iLevel > 0) UpdateParametricCoord(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], iFFDBox);
2879 
2880  /*--- Apply the design variables to the control point position ---*/
2881 
2882  for (iDV = 0; iDV < config->GetnDV(); iDV++) {
2883  switch ( config->GetDesign_Variable(iDV) ) {
2884  case FFD_CONTROL_POINT_2D : SetFFDCPChange_2D(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2885  case FFD_CAMBER_2D : SetFFDCamber_2D(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2886  case FFD_THICKNESS_2D : SetFFDThickness_2D(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2887  case FFD_TWIST_2D : SetFFDTwist_2D(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2888  case FFD_CONTROL_POINT : SetFFDCPChange(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2889  case FFD_NACELLE : SetFFDNacelle(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2890  case FFD_GULL : SetFFDGull(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2891  case FFD_TWIST : SetFFDTwist(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2892  case FFD_ROTATION : SetFFDRotation(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2893  case FFD_CONTROL_SURFACE : SetFFDControl_Surface(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2894  case FFD_CAMBER : SetFFDCamber(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2895  case FFD_THICKNESS : SetFFDThickness(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2896  case FFD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK : SetFFDAngleOfAttack(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2897  }
2898  }
2899 
2900  /*--- Recompute cartesian coordinates using the new control point location ---*/
2901 
2902  MaxDiff = SetCartesianCoord(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], iFFDBox, false);
2903 
2904  if ((MaxDiff > BoundLimit) && (config->GetKind_SU2() == SU2_DEF)) {
2905 
2906  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Out-of-bounds, re-adjusting scale factor to safisfy line search limit." << endl;
2907 
2908  Current_Scale = config->GetOpt_RelaxFactor();
2909  Ratio = (BoundLimit/MaxDiff);
2910  New_Scale = Current_Scale *(Ratio-1.0);
2911  config->SetOpt_RelaxFactor(New_Scale);
2912 
2913  /*--- Apply the design variables to the control point position ---*/
2914 
2915  for (iDV = 0; iDV < config->GetnDV(); iDV++) {
2916  switch ( config->GetDesign_Variable(iDV) ) {
2917  case FFD_CONTROL_POINT_2D : SetFFDCPChange_2D(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2918  case FFD_CAMBER_2D : SetFFDCamber_2D(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2919  case FFD_THICKNESS_2D : SetFFDThickness_2D(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2920  case FFD_TWIST_2D : SetFFDTwist_2D(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2921  case FFD_CONTROL_POINT : SetFFDCPChange(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2922  case FFD_NACELLE : SetFFDNacelle(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2923  case FFD_GULL : SetFFDGull(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2924  case FFD_TWIST : SetFFDTwist(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2925  case FFD_ROTATION : SetFFDRotation(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2926  case FFD_CONTROL_SURFACE : SetFFDControl_Surface(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2927  case FFD_CAMBER : SetFFDCamber(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2928  case FFD_THICKNESS : SetFFDThickness(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2929  case FFD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK : SetFFDAngleOfAttack(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox, iDV, false); break;
2930  }
2931  }
2932 
2933  /*--- Recompute cartesian coordinates using the new control point location ---*/
2934 
2935  MaxDiff = SetCartesianCoord(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], iFFDBox, false);
2936 
2937  }
2938 
2939  /*--- Reparametrization of the parent FFD box ---*/
2940 
2941  for (iParent = 0; iParent < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnParentFFDBox(); iParent++) {
2942  FFDBoxTag = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetParentFFDBoxTag(iParent);
2943  for (jFFDBox = 0; jFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); jFFDBox++)
2944  if (FFDBoxTag == FFDBox[jFFDBox]->GetTag()) break;
2945  UpdateParametricCoord(geometry, config, FFDBox[jFFDBox], jFFDBox);
2946  }
2947 
2948  /*--- Compute the new location of the control points of the child boxes
2949  (using the parent FFDBox) ---*/
2950 
2951  for (iChild = 0; iChild < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnChildFFDBox(); iChild++) {
2952  FFDBoxTag = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetChildFFDBoxTag(iChild);
2953  for (jFFDBox = 0; jFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); jFFDBox++)
2954  if (FFDBoxTag == FFDBox[jFFDBox]->GetTag()) break;
2955  GetCartesianCoordCP(geometry, config, FFDBox[iFFDBox], FFDBox[jFFDBox]);
2956  }
2957  }
2958  }
2959 
2960  /*--- If polar, compute the cartesians coordinates ---*/
2961 
2962  if (cylindrical) {
2963  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2964  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCyl2Cart_CornerPoints(config);
2965  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCyl2Cart_ControlPoints(config);
2966  }
2967  }
2968  else if (spherical || polar) {
2969  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2970  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetSphe2Cart_CornerPoints(config);
2971  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetSphe2Cart_ControlPoints(config);
2972  }
2973  }
2974 
2975  /*--- Output the deformed FFD Boxes ---*/
2976 
2977  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (config->GetKind_SU2() != SU2_DOT)) {
2978  if ((config->GetOutput_FileFormat() == PARAVIEW) || (config->GetOutput_FileFormat() == PARAVIEW_BINARY)) {
2979  cout << "Writing a Paraview file of the FFD boxes." << endl;
2980  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2981  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetParaview(geometry, iFFDBox, false);
2982  }
2983  }
2984  else {
2985  cout << "Writing a Tecplot file of the FFD boxes." << endl;
2986  for (iFFDBox = 0; iFFDBox < GetnFFDBox(); iFFDBox++) {
2987  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetTecplot(geometry, iFFDBox, false);
2988  }
2989  }
2990  }
2991 
2992  }
2993  }
2994 
2995  else {
2996  SU2_MPI::Error("There are no FFD Boxes in the mesh file!!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2997  }
2998 
2999  }
3000 
3001  /*--- External surface file based ---*/
3002 
3003  else if (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == SURFACE_FILE) {
3004 
3005  /*--- Check whether a surface file exists for input ---*/
3006  ofstream Surface_File;
3007  string filename = config->GetDV_Filename();
3008  Surface_File.open(filename.c_str(), ios::in);
3009 
3010  /*--- A surface file does not exist, so write a new one for the
3011  markers that are specified as part of the motion. ---*/
3012  if (Surface_File.fail()) {
3013 
3014  if (rank == MASTER_NODE && size == SINGLE_NODE) {
3015  cout << "No surface positions file found. Writing a template file: " << filename << "." << endl;
3016 
3017  Surface_File.open(filename.c_str(), ios::out);
3018  Surface_File.precision(15);
3019  unsigned long iMarker, jPoint, GlobalIndex, iVertex; su2double *Coords;
3020  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3021  if (config->GetMarker_All_DV(iMarker) == YES) {
3022  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3023  jPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3024  GlobalIndex = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
3025  Coords = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
3026  Surface_File << GlobalIndex << "\t" << Coords[0] << "\t" << Coords[1];
3027  if (geometry->GetnDim() == 2) Surface_File << endl;
3028  else Surface_File << "\t" << Coords[2] << endl;
3029  }
3030  }
3031  }
3032  Surface_File.close();
3033 
3034  } else {
3035  SU2_MPI::Error("No surface positions file found and template writing not yet supported in parallel.\n To generate a template surface positions file, run SU2_DEF again in serial.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3036  }
3037  }
3038 
3039  else {
3040  /*--- A surface file exists, so read in the coordinates ---*/
3041  Surface_File.close();
3042  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Updating the surface coordinates from the input file." << endl;
3043  SetExternal_Deformation(geometry, config, ZONE_0, 0);
3044  }
3045 
3046  }
3047 
3048  else if ((config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == ROTATION) ||
3049  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == TRANSLATION) ||
3050  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == SCALE) ||
3051  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == HICKS_HENNE) ||
3052  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == SURFACE_BUMP) ||
3053  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == ANGLE_OF_ATTACK)) {
3054 
3055  /*--- Apply rotation, displacement and stretching design variables (this
3056  should be done before the bump function design variables) ---*/
3057 
3058  for (iDV = 0; iDV < config->GetnDV(); iDV++) {
3059  switch ( config->GetDesign_Variable(iDV) ) {
3060  case SCALE : SetScale(geometry, config, iDV, false); break;
3061  case TRANSLATION : SetTranslation(geometry, config, iDV, false); break;
3062  case ROTATION : SetRotation(geometry, config, iDV, false); break;
3063  }
3064  }
3065 
3066  /*--- Apply the design variables to the control point position ---*/
3067 
3068  for (iDV = 0; iDV < config->GetnDV(); iDV++) {
3069  switch ( config->GetDesign_Variable(iDV) ) {
3070  case HICKS_HENNE : SetHicksHenne(geometry, config, iDV, false); break;
3071  }
3072  }
3073 
3074  /*--- Apply the design variables to the control point position ---*/
3075 
3076  for (iDV = 0; iDV < config->GetnDV(); iDV++) {
3077  switch ( config->GetDesign_Variable(iDV) ) {
3078  case SURFACE_BUMP : SetSurface_Bump(geometry, config, iDV, false); break;
3079  }
3080  }
3081 
3082  /*--- Apply the angle of attack design variable ---*/
3083 
3084  for (iDV = 0; iDV < config->GetnDV(); iDV++) {
3085  switch ( config->GetDesign_Variable(iDV) ) {
3086  case ANGLE_OF_ATTACK : SetAngleOfAttack(geometry, config, iDV, false); break;
3087  }
3088  }
3089 
3090  }
3091 
3092  /*--- NACA_4Digits design variable ---*/
3093 
3094  else if (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == NACA_4DIGITS) { SetNACA_4Digits(geometry, config); }
3095 
3096  /*--- Parabolic airfoil design variable ---*/
3097 
3098  else if (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == PARABOLIC) { SetParabolic(geometry, config); }
3099 
3100  /*--- Airfoil from file design variable ---*/
3101 
3102  else if (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == AIRFOIL) { SetAirfoil(geometry, config); }
3103 
3104  /*--- FFD setting ---*/
3105 
3106  else if (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == FFD_SETTING) {
3107  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3108  cout << "No surface deformation (setting FFD)." << endl;
3109  }
3110 
3111  /*--- Scale, Translate, and Rotate will be done with rigid mesh transforms. ---*/
3112 
3113  else if ((config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == ROTATION) ||
3114  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == TRANSLATION) ||
3115  (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == SCALE)) {
3116 
3117  /*--- If all markers are deforming, use volume method.
3118  If only some are deforming, use surface method ---*/
3119 
3120  /*--- iDV was uninitialized, so hard-coding to one. Check intended
3121  behavior (might want to loop over all iDV in case we have trans & rotate. ---*/
3122  iDV = 0;
3123  allmoving = true;
3124 
3125  /*--- Loop over markers ---*/
3126  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3127  if (config->GetMarker_All_DV(iMarker) == NO)
3128  allmoving = false;
3129  }
3130 
3131  if (!allmoving) {
3132  /*---Only some markers are moving, use the surface method ---*/
3133  if (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == ROTATION)
3134  SetRotation(geometry, config, iDV, false);
3135  if (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == SCALE)
3136  SetScale(geometry, config, iDV, false);
3137  if (config->GetDesign_Variable(0) == TRANSLATION)
3138  SetTranslation(geometry, config, iDV, false);
3139  }
3140  else {
3141  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3142  cout << "No surface deformation (scaling, rotation, or translation)." << endl;
3143  }
3144  }
3145 
3146  /*--- Design variable not implement ---*/
3147 
3148  else {
3149  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3150  cout << "Design Variable not implemented yet" << endl;
3151  }
3152 
3153 }
3154 
3155 
3156 void CSurfaceMovement::SetSurface_Derivative(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
3157 
3158  su2double DV_Value = 0.0;
3159 
3160  unsigned short iDV = 0, iDV_Value = 0;
3161 
3162  for (iDV = 0; iDV < config->GetnDV(); iDV++) {
3163  for (iDV_Value = 0; iDV_Value < config->GetnDV_Value(iDV); iDV_Value++) {
3164 
3165  DV_Value = config->GetDV_Value(iDV, iDV_Value);
3166 
3167  /*--- If value of the design variable is not 0.0 we apply the differentation.
3168  * Note if multiple variables are non-zero, we end up with the sum of all the derivatives. ---*/
3169 
3170  if (DV_Value != 0.0) {
3171 
3172  DV_Value = 0.0;
3173 
3174  SU2_TYPE::SetDerivative(DV_Value, 1.0);
3175 
3176  config->SetDV_Value(iDV, iDV_Value, DV_Value);
3177  }
3178  }
3179  }
3180 
3181  /*--- Run the surface deformation with DV_Value = 0.0 (no deformation at all) ---*/
3182 
3183  SetSurface_Deformation(geometry, config);
3184 }
3185 
3186 void CSurfaceMovement::CopyBoundary(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
3187 
3188  unsigned short iMarker;
3189  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
3190  su2double *Coord;
3191 
3192  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3193  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3194  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3195  Coord = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3196  geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->SetCoord(Coord);
3197  }
3198  }
3199 
3200 }
3201 
3202 void CSurfaceMovement::SetParametricCoord(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, CFreeFormDefBox *FFDBox, unsigned short iFFDBox) {
3203 
3204  unsigned short iMarker, iDim, iOrder, jOrder, kOrder, lOrder, mOrder, nOrder;
3205  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, TotalVertex = 0;
3206  su2double *CartCoordNew, *ParamCoord, CartCoord[3], ParamCoordGuess[3], MaxDiff, my_MaxDiff = 0.0, Diff, *Coord;
3207  unsigned short nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
3208  su2double X_0, Y_0, Z_0, Xbar, Ybar, Zbar;
3209 
3210  unsigned short BoxFFD = true;
3211  bool cylindrical = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == CYLINDRICAL);
3212  bool spherical = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == SPHERICAL);
3213  bool polar = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == POLAR);
3214 
3215  /*--- Change order and control points reduce the
3216  complexity of the point inversion (this only works with boxes,
3217  in case of Bezier curves, and we maintain an internal copy)---*/
3218 
3219  if (BoxFFD && (config->GetFFD_Blending() == BEZIER)) {
3220 
3221  for (iOrder = 0; iOrder < 2; iOrder++) {
3222  for (jOrder = 0; jOrder < 2; jOrder++) {
3223  for (kOrder = 0; kOrder < 2; kOrder++) {
3224 
3225  lOrder = 0; mOrder = 0; nOrder = 0;
3226  if (iOrder == 1) {lOrder = FFDBox->GetlOrder()-1;}
3227  if (jOrder == 1) {mOrder = FFDBox->GetmOrder()-1;}
3228  if (kOrder == 1) {nOrder = FFDBox->GetnOrder()-1;}
3229 
3230  Coord = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lOrder, mOrder, nOrder);
3231 
3232  FFDBox->SetCoordControlPoints(Coord, iOrder, jOrder, kOrder);
3233 
3234  }
3235  }
3236  }
3237 
3238  FFDBox->SetlOrder(2); FFDBox->SetmOrder(2); FFDBox->SetnOrder(2);
3239  FFDBox->SetnControlPoints();
3240  FFDBox->BlendingFunction[0]->SetOrder(2, 2);
3241  FFDBox->BlendingFunction[1]->SetOrder(2, 2);
3242  FFDBox->BlendingFunction[2]->SetOrder(2, 2);
3243  }
3244  /*--- Point inversion algorithm with a basic box ---*/
3245 
3246  ParamCoordGuess[0] = 0.5; ParamCoordGuess[1] = 0.5; ParamCoordGuess[2] = 0.5;
3247  CartCoord[0] = 0.0; CartCoord[1] = 0.0; CartCoord[2] = 0.0;
3248 
3249  /*--- Count the number of vertices ---*/
3250 
3251  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++)
3252  if (config->GetMarker_All_DV(iMarker) == YES)
3253  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++)
3254  TotalVertex++;
3255 
3256  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3257 
3258  if (config->GetMarker_All_DV(iMarker) == YES) {
3259 
3260  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3261 
3262  /*--- Get the cartesian coordinates ---*/
3263 
3264  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3265  CartCoord[iDim] = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetCoord(iDim);
3266 
3267  /*--- Transform the cartesian into polar ---*/
3268 
3269  if (cylindrical) {
3270  X_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(0); Y_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(1); Z_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(2);
3271 
3272  Xbar = CartCoord[0] - X_0; Ybar = CartCoord[1] - Y_0; Zbar = CartCoord[2] - Z_0;
3273 
3274  CartCoord[0] = sqrt(Ybar*Ybar + Zbar*Zbar);
3275  CartCoord[1] = atan2(Zbar, Ybar); if (CartCoord[1] > PI_NUMBER/2.0) CartCoord[1] -= 2.0*PI_NUMBER;
3276  CartCoord[2] = Xbar;
3277  }
3278  else if (spherical || polar) {
3279  X_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(0); Y_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(1); Z_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(2);
3280 
3281  Xbar = CartCoord[0] - X_0; Ybar = CartCoord[1] - Y_0; Zbar = CartCoord[2] - Z_0;
3282 
3283  CartCoord[0] = sqrt(Xbar*Xbar + Ybar*Ybar + Zbar*Zbar);
3284  CartCoord[1] = atan2(Zbar, Ybar); if (CartCoord[1] > PI_NUMBER/2.0) CartCoord[1] -= 2.0*PI_NUMBER;
3285  CartCoord[2] = acos(Xbar/CartCoord[0]);
3286  }
3287 
3288  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3289 
3290  /*--- If the point is inside the FFD, compute the value of the parametric coordinate ---*/
3291 
3292  if (FFDBox->GetPointFFD(geometry, config, iPoint)) {
3293 
3294  /*--- Find the parametric coordinate ---*/
3295 
3296  ParamCoord = FFDBox->GetParametricCoord_Iterative(iPoint, CartCoord, ParamCoordGuess, config);
3297 
3298  /*--- Compute the cartesian coordinates using the parametric coordinates
3299  to check that everything is correct ---*/
3300 
3301  CartCoordNew = FFDBox->EvalCartesianCoord(ParamCoord);
3302 
3303  /*--- Compute max difference between original value and the recomputed value ---*/
3304 
3305  Diff = 0.0;
3306  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3307  Diff += (CartCoordNew[iDim]-CartCoord[iDim])*(CartCoordNew[iDim]-CartCoord[iDim]);
3308  Diff = sqrt(Diff);
3309  my_MaxDiff = max(my_MaxDiff, Diff);
3310 
3311  /*--- If the parametric coordinates are in (0,1) the point belongs to the FFDBox, using the input tolerance ---*/
3312 
3313  if (((ParamCoord[0] >= - config->GetFFD_Tol()) && (ParamCoord[0] <= 1.0 + config->GetFFD_Tol())) &&
3314  ((ParamCoord[1] >= - config->GetFFD_Tol()) && (ParamCoord[1] <= 1.0 + config->GetFFD_Tol())) &&
3315  ((ParamCoord[2] >= - config->GetFFD_Tol()) && (ParamCoord[2] <= 1.0 + config->GetFFD_Tol()))) {
3316 
3317 
3318  /*--- Rectification of the initial tolerance (we have detected situations
3319  where 0.0 and 1.0 doesn't work properly ---*/
3320 
3321  su2double lower_limit = config->GetFFD_Tol();
3322  su2double upper_limit = 1.0-config->GetFFD_Tol();
3323 
3324  if (ParamCoord[0] < lower_limit) ParamCoord[0] = lower_limit;
3325  if (ParamCoord[1] < lower_limit) ParamCoord[1] = lower_limit;
3326  if (ParamCoord[2] < lower_limit) ParamCoord[2] = lower_limit;
3327  if (ParamCoord[0] > upper_limit) ParamCoord[0] = upper_limit;
3328  if (ParamCoord[1] > upper_limit) ParamCoord[1] = upper_limit;
3329  if (ParamCoord[2] > upper_limit) ParamCoord[2] = upper_limit;
3330 
3331  /*--- Set the value of the parametric coordinate ---*/
3332 
3333  FFDBox->Set_MarkerIndex(iMarker);
3334  FFDBox->Set_VertexIndex(iVertex);
3335  FFDBox->Set_PointIndex(iPoint);
3336  FFDBox->Set_ParametricCoord(ParamCoord);
3337  FFDBox->Set_CartesianCoord(CartCoord);
3338 
3339  ParamCoordGuess[0] = ParamCoord[0]; ParamCoordGuess[1] = ParamCoord[1]; ParamCoordGuess[2] = ParamCoord[2];
3340 
3341  if (Diff >= config->GetFFD_Tol()) {
3342  cout << "Please check this point: Local (" << ParamCoord[0] <<" "<< ParamCoord[1] <<" "<< ParamCoord[2] <<") <-> Global ("
3343  << CartCoord[0] <<" "<< CartCoord[1] <<" "<< CartCoord[2] <<") <-> Error "<< Diff <<" vs "<< config->GetFFD_Tol() <<"." << endl;
3344  }
3345 
3346  }
3347  else {
3348 
3349  if (Diff >= config->GetFFD_Tol()) {
3350  cout << "Please check this point: Local (" << ParamCoord[0] <<" "<< ParamCoord[1] <<" "<< ParamCoord[2] <<") <-> Global ("
3351  << CartCoord[0] <<" "<< CartCoord[1] <<" "<< CartCoord[2] <<") <-> Error "<< Diff <<" vs "<< config->GetFFD_Tol() <<"." << endl;
3352  }
3353 
3354  }
3355 
3356  }
3357  }
3358  }
3359  }
3360 
3361 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3362  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3363  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&my_MaxDiff, &MaxDiff, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3364 #else
3365  MaxDiff = my_MaxDiff;
3366 #endif
3367 
3368  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3369  cout << "Compute parametric coord | FFD box: " << FFDBox->GetTag() << ". Max Diff: " << MaxDiff <<"."<< endl;
3370 
3371 
3372  /*--- After the point inversion, copy the original
3373  information back (this only works with boxes,
3374  and we maintain an internal copy) ---*/
3375 
3376  if (BoxFFD) {
3377  FFDBox->SetOriginalControlPoints();
3378  if (config->GetFFD_Blending() == BEZIER){
3379  FFDBox->BlendingFunction[0]->SetOrder(FFDBox->GetlOrder(), FFDBox->GetlOrder());
3380  FFDBox->BlendingFunction[1]->SetOrder(FFDBox->GetmOrder(), FFDBox->GetmOrder());
3381  FFDBox->BlendingFunction[2]->SetOrder(FFDBox->GetnOrder(), FFDBox->GetnOrder());
3382  }
3383  }
3384 }
3385 
3386 void CSurfaceMovement::SetParametricCoordCP(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, CFreeFormDefBox *FFDBoxParent, CFreeFormDefBox *FFDBoxChild) {
3387  unsigned short iOrder, jOrder, kOrder;
3388  su2double *CartCoord, *ParamCoord, ParamCoordGuess[3];
3389 
3390  for (iOrder = 0; iOrder < FFDBoxChild->GetlOrder(); iOrder++)
3391  for (jOrder = 0; jOrder < FFDBoxChild->GetmOrder(); jOrder++)
3392  for (kOrder = 0; kOrder < FFDBoxChild->GetnOrder(); kOrder++) {
3393  CartCoord = FFDBoxChild->GetCoordControlPoints(iOrder, jOrder, kOrder);
3394  ParamCoord = FFDBoxParent->GetParametricCoord_Iterative(0, CartCoord, ParamCoordGuess, config);
3395  FFDBoxChild->SetParCoordControlPoints(ParamCoord, iOrder, jOrder, kOrder);
3396  }
3397 
3398  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3399  cout << "Compute parametric coord (CP) | FFD parent box: " << FFDBoxParent->GetTag() << ". FFD child box: " << FFDBoxChild->GetTag() <<"."<< endl;
3400 
3401 
3402 }
3403 
3404 void CSurfaceMovement::GetCartesianCoordCP(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, CFreeFormDefBox *FFDBoxParent, CFreeFormDefBox *FFDBoxChild) {
3405  unsigned short iOrder, jOrder, kOrder, iDim;
3406  su2double *CartCoord, *ParamCoord;
3407 
3408  for (iOrder = 0; iOrder < FFDBoxChild->GetlOrder(); iOrder++)
3409  for (jOrder = 0; jOrder < FFDBoxChild->GetmOrder(); jOrder++)
3410  for (kOrder = 0; kOrder < FFDBoxChild->GetnOrder(); kOrder++) {
3411  ParamCoord = FFDBoxChild->GetParCoordControlPoints(iOrder, jOrder, kOrder);
3412 
3413  /*--- Clip the value of the parametric coordinates (just in case) ---*/
3414  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 3; iDim++) {
3415  if (ParamCoord[iDim] >= 1.0) ParamCoord[iDim] = 1.0;
3416  if (ParamCoord[iDim] <= 0.0) ParamCoord[iDim] = 0.0;
3417  }
3418 
3419  CartCoord = FFDBoxParent->EvalCartesianCoord(ParamCoord);
3420  FFDBoxChild->SetCoordControlPoints(CartCoord, iOrder, jOrder, kOrder);
3421  FFDBoxChild->SetCoordControlPoints_Copy(CartCoord, iOrder, jOrder, kOrder);
3422 
3423  }
3424 
3425  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3426  cout << "Update cartesian coord (CP) | FFD parent box: " << FFDBoxParent->GetTag() << ". FFD child box: " << FFDBoxChild->GetTag() <<"."<< endl;
3427 
3428 }
3429 
3430 void CSurfaceMovement::CheckFFDDimension(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, CFreeFormDefBox *FFDBox, unsigned short iFFDBox) {
3431 
3432  unsigned short iIndex, jIndex, kIndex, lDegree, mDegree, nDegree, iDV;
3433  bool OutOffLimits;
3434  bool polar = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == POLAR);
3435 
3436  lDegree = FFDBox->GetlOrder()-1;
3437  mDegree = FFDBox->GetmOrder()-1;
3438  nDegree = FFDBox->GetnOrder()-1;
3439 
3440  OutOffLimits = false;
3441  for (iDV = 0; iDV < config->GetnDV(); iDV++) {
3442  switch ( config->GetDesign_Variable(iDV) ) {
3443  case FFD_CONTROL_POINT_2D :
3444  if (polar) {
3445  iIndex = SU2_TYPE::Int(fabs(config->GetParamDV(iDV, 1)));
3446  kIndex = SU2_TYPE::Int(fabs(config->GetParamDV(iDV, 2)));
3447  if ((iIndex > lDegree) || (kIndex > nDegree)) OutOffLimits = true;
3448  }
3449  else {
3450  iIndex = SU2_TYPE::Int(fabs(config->GetParamDV(iDV, 1)));
3451  jIndex = SU2_TYPE::Int(fabs(config->GetParamDV(iDV, 2)));
3452  if ((iIndex > lDegree) || (jIndex > mDegree)) OutOffLimits = true;
3453  }
3454  break;
3455  case FFD_CAMBER : case FFD_THICKNESS :
3456  iIndex = SU2_TYPE::Int(fabs(config->GetParamDV(iDV, 1)));
3457  jIndex = SU2_TYPE::Int(fabs(config->GetParamDV(iDV, 2)));
3458  if ((iIndex > lDegree) || (jIndex > mDegree)) OutOffLimits = true;
3459  break;
3460  case FFD_CAMBER_2D : case FFD_THICKNESS_2D :
3461  iIndex = SU2_TYPE::Int(fabs(config->GetParamDV(iDV, 1)));
3462  if (iIndex > lDegree) OutOffLimits = true;
3463  break;
3464  case FFD_CONTROL_POINT : case FFD_NACELLE :
3465  iIndex = SU2_TYPE::Int(fabs(config->GetParamDV(iDV, 1)));
3466  jIndex= SU2_TYPE::Int(fabs(config->GetParamDV(iDV, 2)));
3467  kIndex = SU2_TYPE::Int(fabs(config->GetParamDV(iDV, 3)));
3468  if ((iIndex > lDegree) || (jIndex > mDegree) || (kIndex > nDegree)) OutOffLimits = true;
3469  break;
3470  case FFD_GULL : case FFD_TWIST :
3471  jIndex= SU2_TYPE::Int(fabs(config->GetParamDV(iDV, 1)));
3472  if (jIndex > mDegree) OutOffLimits = true;
3473  break;
3474  }
3475  }
3476 
3477  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3478  if (OutOffLimits) {
3479  char buf1[100], buf2[100];
3480  SPRINTF(buf1, "Design variables out off FFD limits (%u, %u, %u).\n", lDegree, mDegree, nDegree);
3481  SPRINTF(buf2, "Please check the ijk indices of the design variables.");
3482  SU2_MPI::Error(string(buf1) + string(buf2), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3483  }
3484  }
3485 
3486  /*--- This barrier is important to guaranty that we will stop the software in a clean way ---*/
3487 
3488 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3489  SU2_MPI::Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3490 #endif
3491 
3492 }
3493 
3494 void CSurfaceMovement::CheckFFDIntersections(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, CFreeFormDefBox *FFDBox, unsigned short iFFDBox) {
3495 
3496  su2double Coord_0[] = {0,0,0}, Coord_1[] = {0,0,0};
3497  unsigned short index, iMarker, iNode, jNode, lDegree, mDegree, nDegree, iDim;
3498  unsigned long iElem, iPoint, jPoint;
3499  bool IPlane_Intersect_A = false, IPlane_Intersect_B = false;
3500  bool JPlane_Intersect_A = false, JPlane_Intersect_B = false;
3501  bool KPlane_Intersect_A = false, KPlane_Intersect_B = false;
3502  su2double X_0, Y_0, Z_0, Xbar, Ybar, Zbar;
3503 
3504  unsigned short Kind_SU2 = config->GetKind_SU2();
3505  bool FFD_Symmetry_Plane = config->GetFFD_Symmetry_Plane();
3506  bool cylindrical = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == CYLINDRICAL);
3507  bool spherical = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == SPHERICAL);
3508  bool polar = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == POLAR);
3509  bool cartesian = (config->GetFFD_CoordSystem() == CARTESIAN);
3510 
3511  lDegree = FFDBox->GetlOrder()-1;
3512  mDegree = FFDBox->GetmOrder()-1;
3513  nDegree = FFDBox->GetnOrder()-1;
3514 
3515  if (config->GetFFD_Continuity() != USER_INPUT) {
3516 
3517  /*--- Check intersection with plane i=0 ---*/
3518 
3519  su2double *IPlane_Coord_0_A = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, 0, 0);
3520  su2double *IPlane_Coord_1_A = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, 0, nDegree);
3521  su2double *IPlane_Coord_2_A = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, mDegree, 0);
3522 
3523  su2double *IPlane_Coord_0_A_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, mDegree, nDegree);
3524  su2double *IPlane_Coord_1_A_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, mDegree, 0);
3525  su2double *IPlane_Coord_2_A_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, 0, nDegree);
3526 
3527  /*--- Check intersection with plane i=lDegree ---*/
3528 
3529  su2double *IPlane_Coord_0_B = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, 0, 0);
3530  su2double *IPlane_Coord_1_B = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, 0, nDegree);
3531  su2double *IPlane_Coord_2_B = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, mDegree, 0);
3532 
3533  su2double *IPlane_Coord_0_B_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, mDegree, nDegree);
3534  su2double *IPlane_Coord_1_B_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, mDegree, 0);
3535  su2double *IPlane_Coord_2_B_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, 0, nDegree);
3536 
3537  /*--- Check intersection with plane j=0 ---*/
3538 
3539  su2double *JPlane_Coord_0_A = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, 0, 0);
3540  su2double *JPlane_Coord_1_A = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, 0, nDegree);
3541  su2double *JPlane_Coord_2_A = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, 0, 0);
3542 
3543  su2double *JPlane_Coord_0_A_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, 0, nDegree);
3544  su2double *JPlane_Coord_1_A_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, 0, 0);
3545  su2double *JPlane_Coord_2_A_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, 0, nDegree);
3546 
3547  /*--- Check intersection with plane j=mDegree ---*/
3548 
3549  su2double *JPlane_Coord_0_B = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, mDegree, 0);
3550  su2double *JPlane_Coord_1_B = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, mDegree, nDegree);
3551  su2double *JPlane_Coord_2_B = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, mDegree, 0);
3552 
3553  su2double *JPlane_Coord_0_B_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, mDegree, nDegree);
3554  su2double *JPlane_Coord_1_B_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, mDegree, 0);
3555  su2double *JPlane_Coord_2_B_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, mDegree, nDegree);
3556 
3557  /*--- Check intersection with plane k=0 ---*/
3558 
3559  su2double *KPlane_Coord_0_A = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, 0, 0);
3560  su2double *KPlane_Coord_1_A = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, mDegree, 0);
3561  su2double *KPlane_Coord_2_A = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, 0, 0);
3562 
3563  su2double *KPlane_Coord_0_A_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, mDegree, 0);
3564  su2double *KPlane_Coord_1_A_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, 0, 0);
3565  su2double *KPlane_Coord_2_A_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, mDegree, 0);
3566 
3567  /*--- Check intersection with plane k=nDegree ---*/
3568 
3569  su2double *KPlane_Coord_0_B = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, 0, nDegree);
3570  su2double *KPlane_Coord_1_B = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, mDegree, nDegree);
3571  su2double *KPlane_Coord_2_B = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, 0, nDegree);
3572 
3573  su2double *KPlane_Coord_0_B_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, mDegree, nDegree);
3574  su2double *KPlane_Coord_1_B_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(lDegree, 0, nDegree);
3575  su2double *KPlane_Coord_2_B_ = FFDBox->GetCoordControlPoints(0, mDegree, nDegree);
3576 
3577  /*--- Loop over all the grid triangles ---*/
3578 
3579  IPlane_Intersect_A = false; IPlane_Intersect_B = false;
3580  JPlane_Intersect_A = false; JPlane_Intersect_B = false;
3581  KPlane_Intersect_A = false; KPlane_Intersect_B = false;
3582 
3583  /*--- Only the markers in the moving list ---*/
3584 
3585  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < geometry->GetnMarker(); iMarker++) {
3586 
3587  if (((config->GetMarker_All_Moving(iMarker) == YES) && (Kind_SU2 == SU2_CFD)) ||
3588  ((config->GetMarker_All_DV(iMarker) == YES) && (Kind_SU2 == SU2_DEF)) ||
3589  ((config->GetMarker_All_DV(iMarker) == YES) && (Kind_SU2 == SU2_GEO)) ||
3590  ((config->GetMarker_All_DV(iMarker) == YES) && (Kind_SU2 == SU2_DOT)) ||
3591  ((config->GetMarker_All_DV(iMarker) == YES) && (config->GetDirectDiff() == D_DESIGN))) {
3592 
3593  for (iElem = 0; iElem < geometry->GetnElem_Bound(iMarker); iElem++) {
3594 
3595  for (iNode = 0; iNode < geometry->bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
3596  iPoint = geometry->bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
3597 
3598  for (jNode = 0; jNode < geometry->bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); jNode++) {
3599  jPoint = geometry->bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(jNode);
3600 
3601  if (jPoint > iPoint) {
3602 
3603  for (iDim = 0; iDim < geometry->GetnDim(); iDim++) {
3604  Coord_0[iDim] = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord()[iDim];
3605  Coord_1[iDim] = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord()[iDim];
3606  }
3607 
3608  /*--- Write the coordinates in the right parametric system ---*/
3609 
3610  if (cylindrical) {
3611 
3612  X_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(0); Y_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(1); Z_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(2);
3613 
3614  Xbar = Coord_0[0] - X_0; Ybar = Coord_0[1] - Y_0; Zbar = Coord_0[2] - Z_0;
3615 
3616  Coord_0[0] = sqrt(Ybar*Ybar + Zbar*Zbar);
3617  Coord_0[1] = atan2(Zbar, Ybar); if (Coord_0[1] > PI_NUMBER/2.0) Coord_0[1] -= 2.0*PI_NUMBER;
3618  Coord_0[2] = Xbar;
3619 
3620  Xbar = Coord_1[0] - X_0; Ybar = Coord_1[1] - Y_0; Zbar = Coord_1[2] - Z_0;
3621 
3622  Coord_1[0] = sqrt(Ybar*Ybar + Zbar*Zbar);
3623  Coord_1[1] = atan2(Zbar, Ybar); if (Coord_1[1] > PI_NUMBER/2.0) Coord_1[1] -= 2.0*PI_NUMBER;
3624  Coord_1[2] = Xbar;
3625 
3626  }
3627 
3628  else if (spherical || polar) {
3629 
3630  X_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(0); Y_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(1); Z_0 = config->GetFFD_Axis(2);
3631 
3632  Xbar = Coord_0[0] - X_0; Ybar = Coord_0[1] - Y_0; Zbar = Coord_0[2] - Z_0;
3633 
3634  Coord_0[0] = sqrt(Xbar*Xbar + Ybar*Ybar + Zbar*Zbar);
3635  Coord_0[1] = atan2(Zbar, Ybar); if (Coord_0[1] > PI_NUMBER/2.0) Coord_0[1] -= 2.0*PI_NUMBER;
3636  Coord_0[2] = acos (Xbar/Coord_0[0]);
3637 
3638  Xbar = Coord_1[0] - X_0; Ybar = Coord_1[1] - Y_0; Zbar = Coord_1[2] - Z_0;
3639 
3640  Coord_1[0] = sqrt(Xbar*Xbar + Ybar*Ybar + Zbar*Zbar);
3641  Coord_1[1] = atan2(Zbar, Ybar); if (Coord_1[1] > PI_NUMBER/2.0) Coord_1[1] -= 2.0*PI_NUMBER;
3642  Coord_1[2] = acos(Xbar/Coord_1[0]);
3643 
3644  }
3645 
3646  if (geometry->GetnDim() == 3) {
3647 
3648  if (!IPlane_Intersect_A) {
3649  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, IPlane_Coord_0_A, IPlane_Coord_1_A, IPlane_Coord_2_A)) { IPlane_Intersect_A = true; }
3650  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, IPlane_Coord_0_A_, IPlane_Coord_1_A_, IPlane_Coord_2_A_)) { IPlane_Intersect_A = true; }
3651  }
3652 
3653  if (!IPlane_Intersect_B) {
3654  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, IPlane_Coord_0_B, IPlane_Coord_1_B, IPlane_Coord_2_B)) { IPlane_Intersect_B = true; }
3655  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, IPlane_Coord_0_B_, IPlane_Coord_1_B_, IPlane_Coord_2_B_)) { IPlane_Intersect_B = true; }
3656  }
3657 
3658  if ((!JPlane_Intersect_A) && (!FFD_Symmetry_Plane)) {
3659  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, JPlane_Coord_0_A, JPlane_Coord_1_A, JPlane_Coord_2_A)) { JPlane_Intersect_A = true; }
3660  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, JPlane_Coord_0_A_, JPlane_Coord_1_A_, JPlane_Coord_2_A_)) { JPlane_Intersect_A = true; }
3661  }
3662 
3663  if (cartesian) {
3664  if ((!JPlane_Intersect_B) && (!FFD_Symmetry_Plane)) {
3665  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, JPlane_Coord_0_B, JPlane_Coord_1_B, JPlane_Coord_2_B)) { JPlane_Intersect_B = true; }
3666  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, JPlane_Coord_0_B_, JPlane_Coord_1_B_, JPlane_Coord_2_B_)) { JPlane_Intersect_B = true; }
3667  }
3668  }
3669  else {
3670  if (!JPlane_Intersect_B) {
3671  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, JPlane_Coord_0_B, JPlane_Coord_1_B, JPlane_Coord_2_B)) { JPlane_Intersect_B = true; }
3672  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, JPlane_Coord_0_B_, JPlane_Coord_1_B_, JPlane_Coord_2_B_)) { JPlane_Intersect_B = true; }
3673  }
3674  }
3675 
3676  if (!KPlane_Intersect_A) {
3677  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, KPlane_Coord_0_A, KPlane_Coord_1_A, KPlane_Coord_2_A)) { KPlane_Intersect_A = true; }
3678  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, KPlane_Coord_0_A_, KPlane_Coord_1_A_, KPlane_Coord_2_A_)) { KPlane_Intersect_A = true; }
3679  }
3680 
3681  if (!KPlane_Intersect_B) {
3682  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, KPlane_Coord_0_B, KPlane_Coord_1_B, KPlane_Coord_2_B)) { KPlane_Intersect_B = true; }
3683  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsTriangle(Coord_0, Coord_1, KPlane_Coord_0_B_, KPlane_Coord_1_B_, KPlane_Coord_2_B_)) { KPlane_Intersect_B = true; }
3684  }
3685 
3686  } else {
3687 
3688  if (!IPlane_Intersect_A) {
3689  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsLine(Coord_0, Coord_1, IPlane_Coord_0_A, IPlane_Coord_2_A)) { IPlane_Intersect_A = true;}
3690  }
3691  if (!IPlane_Intersect_B) {
3692  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsLine(Coord_0, Coord_1, IPlane_Coord_0_B, IPlane_Coord_2_B)) { IPlane_Intersect_B = true;}
3693  }
3694  if (!JPlane_Intersect_A) {
3695  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsLine(Coord_0, Coord_1, JPlane_Coord_0_A, JPlane_Coord_2_A)) { JPlane_Intersect_A = true;}
3696  }
3697  if (!JPlane_Intersect_B) {
3698  if (geometry->SegmentIntersectsLine(Coord_0, Coord_1, JPlane_Coord_0_B, JPlane_Coord_2_B)) { JPlane_Intersect_B = true;}
3699  }
3700  }
3701  }
3702  }
3703  }
3704  }
3705  }
3706  }
3707 
3708  /*--- Comunicate the planes that interesect the surface ---*/
3709 
3710  unsigned short MyCode[6] = {0,0,0,0,0,0}, Code[6] = {0,0,0,0,0,0};
3711 
3712  if (IPlane_Intersect_A) MyCode[0] = 1;
3713  if (IPlane_Intersect_B) MyCode[1] = 1;
3714  if (JPlane_Intersect_A) MyCode[2] = 1;
3715  if (JPlane_Intersect_B) MyCode[3] = 1;
3716  if (KPlane_Intersect_A) MyCode[4] = 1;
3717  if (KPlane_Intersect_B) MyCode[5] = 1;
3718 
3719 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3720 
3721  /*--- Add SU2_MPI::Allreduce information using all the nodes ---*/
3722 
3723  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyCode, &Code, 6, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3724 
3725 #else
3726 
3727  Code[0] = MyCode[0]; Code[1] = MyCode[1]; Code[2] = MyCode[2];
3728  Code[3] = MyCode[3]; Code[4] = MyCode[4]; Code[5] = MyCode[5];
3729 
3730 #endif
3731 
3732  if (Code[0] != 0) IPlane_Intersect_A = true; else IPlane_Intersect_A = false;
3733  if (Code[1] != 0) IPlane_Intersect_B = true; else IPlane_Intersect_B = false;
3734  if (Code[2] != 0) JPlane_Intersect_A = true; else JPlane_Intersect_A = false;
3735  if (Code[3] != 0) JPlane_Intersect_B = true; else JPlane_Intersect_B = false;
3736  if (Code[4] != 0) KPlane_Intersect_A = true; else KPlane_Intersect_A = false;
3737  if (Code[5] != 0) KPlane_Intersect_B = true; else KPlane_Intersect_B = false;
3738 
3739  /*--- Screen output ---*/
3740 
3741  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3742 
3743  if (IPlane_Intersect_A || IPlane_Intersect_B ||
3744  JPlane_Intersect_A || JPlane_Intersect_B ||
3745  KPlane_Intersect_A || KPlane_Intersect_B ) {
3746 
3747  cout << "The FFD planes ";
3748 
3749  if (cartesian) {
3750  if (IPlane_Intersect_A) cout << "i=0, ";
3751  if (IPlane_Intersect_B) cout << "i="<< lDegree << ", ";
3752  if (JPlane_Intersect_A) cout << "j=0, ";
3753  if (JPlane_Intersect_B) cout << "j="<< mDegree << ", ";
3754  if (KPlane_Intersect_A) cout << "k=0, ";
3755  if (KPlane_Intersect_B) cout << "k="<< nDegree << ", ";
3756  }
3757  else if (cylindrical) {
3758  if (IPlane_Intersect_A) cout << "r=0, ";
3759  if (IPlane_Intersect_B) cout << "r="<< lDegree << ", ";
3760  if (JPlane_Intersect_A) cout << "theta=0, ";
3761  if (JPlane_Intersect_B) cout << "theta="<< mDegree << ", ";
3762  if (KPlane_Intersect_A) cout << "z=0, ";
3763  if (KPlane_Intersect_B) cout << "z="<< nDegree << ", ";
3764  }
3765  else if (spherical) {
3766  if (IPlane_Intersect_A) cout << "r=0, ";
3767  if (IPlane_Intersect_B) cout << "r="<< lDegree << ", ";
3768  if (JPlane_Intersect_A) cout << "theta=0, ";
3769  if (JPlane_Intersect_B) cout << "theta="<< mDegree << ", ";
3770  if (KPlane_Intersect_A) cout << "phi=0, ";
3771  if (KPlane_Intersect_B) cout << "phi="<< nDegree << ", ";
3772  }
3773  else if (polar) {
3774  if (IPlane_Intersect_A) cout << "r=0, ";
3775  if (IPlane_Intersect_B) cout << "r="<< lDegree << ", ";
3776  if (KPlane_Intersect_A) cout << "theta=0, ";
3777  if (KPlane_Intersect_B) cout << "theta="<< nDegree << ", ";
3778  }
3779 
3780  cout << "intersect solid surfaces." << endl;
3781  }
3782 
3783  }
3784 
3785  }
3786 
3787  /*--- Fix the FFD planes based on the intersections with solid surfaces,
3788  and the continuity level, check that we have enough degree for the continuity
3789  that we are looking for ---*/
3790 
3791  if (config->GetFFD_Continuity() == USER_INPUT) {
3792  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3793  cout << "SU2 is fixing user's input planes." << endl;
3794 
3795  for (index = 0; index < config->GetnFFD_Fix_IDir(); index++)
3796  if ((config->GetFFD_Fix_IDir(index) <= lDegree) && (config->GetFFD_Fix_IDir(index) >= 0))
3797  FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(config->GetFFD_Fix_IDir(index));
3798  for (index = 0; index < config->GetnFFD_Fix_JDir(); index++)
3799  if ((config->GetFFD_Fix_JDir(index) <= mDegree) && (config->GetFFD_Fix_JDir(index) >= 0))
3800  FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(config->GetFFD_Fix_JDir(index));
3801  for (index = 0; index < config->GetnFFD_Fix_KDir(); index++)
3802  if ((config->GetFFD_Fix_KDir(index) <= nDegree) && (config->GetFFD_Fix_KDir(index) >= 0))
3803  FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(config->GetFFD_Fix_KDir(index));
3804 
3805  }
3806 
3807  if (config->GetFFD_Continuity() == DERIVATIVE_NONE) {
3808  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3809  cout << "SU2 is fixing the planes to maintain a continuous surface." << endl;
3810 
3811  if (IPlane_Intersect_A) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(0); }
3812  if (IPlane_Intersect_B) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(lDegree); }
3813  if (JPlane_Intersect_A) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(0); }
3814  if (JPlane_Intersect_B) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(mDegree); }
3815  if (KPlane_Intersect_A) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(0); }
3816  if (KPlane_Intersect_B) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(nDegree); }
3817 
3818  }
3819 
3820  if (config->GetFFD_Continuity() == DERIVATIVE_1ST) {
3821  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3822  cout << "SU2 is fixing the planes to maintain a continuous 1st order derivative." << endl;
3823 
3824  if (IPlane_Intersect_A) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(0); FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(1); }
3825  if (IPlane_Intersect_B) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(lDegree); FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(lDegree-1); }
3826  if (JPlane_Intersect_A) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(0); FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(1); }
3827  if (JPlane_Intersect_B) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(mDegree); FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(mDegree-1); }
3828  if (KPlane_Intersect_A) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(0); FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(1); }
3829  if (KPlane_Intersect_B) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(nDegree); FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(nDegree-1); }
3830 
3831  }
3832 
3833  if (config->GetFFD_Continuity() == DERIVATIVE_2ND) {
3834  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3835  cout << "SU2 is fixing the planes to maintain a continuous 2nd order derivative." << endl;
3836 
3837  if ((IPlane_Intersect_A) && (lDegree > 1)) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(0); FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(1); FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(2); }
3838  if ((IPlane_Intersect_B) && (lDegree > 1)) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(lDegree); FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(lDegree-1); FFDBox->Set_Fix_IPlane(lDegree-2); }
3839  if ((JPlane_Intersect_A) && (mDegree > 1)) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(0); FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(1); FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(2); }
3840  if ((JPlane_Intersect_B) && (mDegree > 1)) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(mDegree); FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(mDegree-1); FFDBox->Set_Fix_JPlane(mDegree-2); }
3841  if ((KPlane_Intersect_A) && (nDegree > 1)) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(0); FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(1);FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(2); }
3842  if ((KPlane_Intersect_B) && (nDegree > 1)) { FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(nDegree); FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(nDegree-1); FFDBox->Set_Fix_KPlane(nDegree-2); }
3843 
3844  }
3845 
3846 }
3847 
3848 void CSurfaceMovement::UpdateParametricCoord(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, CFreeFormDefBox *FFDBox, unsigned short iFFDBox) {
3849  unsigned short iMarker, iDim;
3850  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, iSurfacePoints;
3851  su2double CartCoord[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, *CartCoordNew, *CartCoordOld;
3852  su2double *ParamCoord, *var_coord, ParamCoordGuess[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0};
3853  su2double MaxDiff, my_MaxDiff = 0.0, Diff;
3854 
3855  /*--- Recompute the parametric coordinates ---*/
3856 
3857  for (iSurfacePoints = 0; iSurfacePoints < FFDBox->GetnSurfacePoint(); iSurfacePoints++) {
3858 
3859  /*--- Get the marker of the surface point ---*/
3860 
3861  iMarker = FFDBox->Get_MarkerIndex(iSurfacePoints);
3862 
3863  if (config->GetMarker_All_DV(iMarker) == YES) {
3864 
3865  /*--- Get the vertex of the surface point ---*/
3866 
3867  iVertex = FFDBox->Get_VertexIndex(iSurfacePoints);
3868  iPoint = FFDBox->Get_PointIndex(iSurfacePoints);
3869 
3870  /*--- Get the parametric and cartesians coordinates of the
3871  surface point (they don't mach) ---*/
3872 
3873  ParamCoord = FFDBox->Get_ParametricCoord(iSurfacePoints);
3874 
3875  /*--- Compute and set the cartesian coord using the variation computed
3876  with the previous deformation ---*/
3877 
3878  var_coord = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetVarCoord();
3879  CartCoordOld = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3880  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 3; iDim++)
3881  CartCoord[iDim] = CartCoordOld[iDim] + var_coord[iDim];
3882  FFDBox->Set_CartesianCoord(CartCoord, iSurfacePoints);
3883 
3884  /*--- Find the parametric coordinate using as ParamCoordGuess the previous value ---*/
3885 
3886  ParamCoordGuess[0] = ParamCoord[0]; ParamCoordGuess[1] = ParamCoord[1]; ParamCoordGuess[2] = ParamCoord[2];
3887  ParamCoord = FFDBox->GetParametricCoord_Iterative(iPoint, CartCoord, ParamCoordGuess, config);
3888 
3889  /*--- Set the new value of the parametric coordinates ---*/
3890 
3891  FFDBox->Set_ParametricCoord(ParamCoord, iSurfacePoints);
3892 
3893  /*--- Compute the cartesian coordinates using the parametric coordinates
3894  to check that everything is correct ---*/
3895 
3896  CartCoordNew = FFDBox->EvalCartesianCoord(ParamCoord);
3897 
3898  /*--- Compute max difference between original value and the recomputed value ---*/
3899 
3900  Diff = 0.0;
3901  for (iDim = 0; iDim < geometry->GetnDim(); iDim++)
3902  Diff += (CartCoordNew[iDim]-CartCoord[iDim])*(CartCoordNew[iDim]-CartCoord[iDim]);
3903  Diff = sqrt(Diff);
3904  my_MaxDiff = max(my_MaxDiff, Diff);
3905 
3906  }
3907  }
3908 
3909 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3910  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&my_MaxDiff, &MaxDiff, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3911 #else
3912  MaxDiff = my_MaxDiff;
3913 #endif
3914 
3915  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
3916  cout << "Update parametric coord | FFD box: " << FFDBox->GetTag() << ". Max Diff: " << MaxDiff <<"."<< endl;
3917 
3918 }
3919 
3920 su2double CSurfaceMovement::SetCartesianCoord(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, CFreeFormDefBox *FFDBox, unsigned short iFFDBox, bool ResetDef) {
3921 
3922  su2double *CartCoordNew, Diff, my_MaxDiff = 0.0, MaxDiff,
